Params: {1: 'Lost Chapter', 2: 'Unforeseen Storm', 3: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Atlas/CommonLogo/BgLogo1.png'}
{1: 'ThemeEnable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory55.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Luna', 3: 'Huaxu, are you there?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: 'I don\'t know what "there" refers to, but I am currently in my active start-up cycle. Next start-up cycle is in...'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "I don't care about that.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'That conversation you showed me earlier...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: 'Are you referring to the hour-long conversation?'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'Yes. Play it back for me again.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: 'As you wish.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory152.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Qu', 3: 'Huaxu, how can humanity survive under such circumstances?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: 'All data has been parsed, but no such method exists.'}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: 'Regardless of the method, humanity will only end in destruction.'}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: 'Earth has already experienced five mass extinctions. Humanity is merely just a visitor on this age-old planet.'}
{3: "After hearing Huaxu's response, Qu slowly closes her eyes."}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: 'According to the consciousness simulation, you already know the answer to this question before asking me. Why did you ask me?'}
{3: 'Qu stands there in silence.'}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: 'The motion sensor has detected that you have not moved in over 20 seconds.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Qu', 3: 'Can we only place our hopes in the future? But people in the present...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: "I don't understand your question."}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'That was a rhetorical question, Huaxu...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'What if we expand the scope of civilization from humanity to incorporate the rest of the Earth?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Would you still give me the same response, Huaxu?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: 'But this conflicts with your original intent.'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'A goal is worthless if it is unattainable at the onset.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'I want something that can actually be achieved.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: "I've adjusted the input range and parameters to meet your requirements."}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'I want results.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: 'Very low probability, but not impossible. Changing the scope has made certain options possible now.'}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: 'Why do you say so?'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Perhaps, I am beginning to understand my mixed emotions.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory55.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Huaxu', 3: 'The recording ends here.'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "Don't you find it strange that you are showing me this piece of information?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: 'I am simply presenting the facts as they were. That is all.'}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: 'I cannot comprehend what has led you to form this view.'}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: 'I have detected silence that does not conform to the logic of the current conversation.'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "All I know is, what you showed me was not what I had asked for. And that it's not what we decrypted from your main memory.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'So, as an AI without emotions... Who inspired you to show me these records?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "I didn't think an AI could fall silent.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: '—This involves highly classified information.'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'We will find out... Whether you like it or not.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'Say... Maybe even now.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: '—Digital signature 87533-DE4 error.'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "Looks like you aren't very good at keeping secrets.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'This digital signature leads to the record you just showed me. I need to know who left it. Tell me.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: 'Unauthorized access. Unauthorized access. Unauth—Access granted.'}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: "Code 87533-DE4 is the Kowloong Chamber of Commerce's highest encryption authority. It was directly signed by the leader and encapsulated with a permanent digital watermark."}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: '—I must not divulge this information.'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "If there is something I want to know, you can't hide it from me. Don't blame yourself, even though I know you won't.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'So... Why would the leader of Kowloong want to give this information to the enemy?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: 'Additional information on the signature uncovered. Shall I display it?'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "...I see. This Kowloong leader even knew I'd get my hands on this information.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: '—"I already know who saw this message, but I want to clarify something."'}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: '"Kowloong and the Tabula Akasha are just necessary measures taken with the belief that mankind is bound to perish."'}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: '"But I\'m not afraid. Even if there is the smallest of chances, I believe in the possibilities of mankind."'}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: '"So if anyone can defeat me and take Huaxu..."'}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: '"The moment Huaxu is taken, I will decrypt all of the memory files. There\'s no need to waste time. These files are necessary to rebuild civilization."'}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: '"—KCC Leader, Qu"'}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: '—Playback complete.'}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: 'I have once more detected silence that does not conform to the current conversation logic.'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'This explains why we extracted data from the database almost effortlessly.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: '...Even effortlessly finding information on "an experimental high-gain antenna cluster belonging to the World Government" buried somewhere in the Arctic Route Union.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: 'I have trouble parsing whether your speech is sarcastic or complacent.'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'Perhaps both?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "After all, your leader must have never expected you to end up in the hands of humanity's enemy when leaving this message.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: 'I am unable to discern your relations to human civilization, but I will faithfully execute the orders of Lady Qu.'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "Aren't you curious about what I will do when I get my hands on the antenna cluster?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "—Maybe I'll just act like the people before the Golden Age, wearing wreaths on their heads, broadcasting pop music around the world?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: 'I have no "curiosity" function. If that is what you want, I am only programmed to tell you how to achieve your goal.'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'Forget it. The last puzzle piece is up ahead.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "Let's finish this. I'm getting sick of humanity.", 4: '1'}
